Room.Name: A long tunnel
Room.Description: You encounter some rapids as you enter this tunnel cut out of the mountains by the river.

Room.Name: A long tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel branches off north.

Room.Name: A long tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel branches off south.

Room.Name: A long tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel branches off to the south.

Room.Name: An underground lake
Room.Description: You are floating on a jet-black underground lake fed by dripping water and lime from above. The tunnel continues to the east and the river leads back west. To the north is a roughly-hewn hallway. There is also a tunnel south.

Room.Name: A long narrow tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel rises sharply to the east.

Room.Name: A wide tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel continues east and west. To the east the tunnel dives down into a bright light.

Room.Name: Cave-in
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a large pile of rubble created from the last rockslide.

Exit.Description: You can easily slide down the rocks without getting hurt.

Room.Name: At the foot of the rubble
Room.Description: You are at the bottom of a large pile of rubble. A tunnel branches off to the north and east.

Room.Name: Cave entrance
Room.Description: You stand in the middle of a large and beautiful cave. A path leads deeper into the darkness.

Exit.Description: You look down into the cave. Bones are strewn about everywhere.

Room.Name: Giant cave
Room.Description: This cavern overwhelms you. The walls and ceiling seem miles away. Bones of previous adventurers lie strewn on the cavern floor.

Room.Name: Narrow bend
Room.Description: The tunnel turns to the south and west.

Room.Name: Large cave
Room.Description: You are standing in a large cave. Many furs are spread out on the floor.

Room.Name: Damp hallway
Room.Description: The walls here are extremely damp, as well as the floor.

Exit.Description: You hear drops of water.

Room.Name: Underground pool
Room.Description: You are wading in a knee deep pool of lime-water.

Room.Name: Damp hallway
Room.Description: The walls of the tunnel are extremely damp here. You hear the faint sound of running water to the south.

Exit.Description: You hear drops of water.

Room.Name: Narrow crawlway
Room.Description: This crawlway is just big enough for a human to crawl through or a halfling to walk through.

Exit.Description: You smell the fragrant odor of fungus.

Room.Name: Large cavern
Room.Description: You have entered a very large cavern. The rock formations would amaze almost any dwarf.

Room.Name: Fungus patch
Room.Description: As you walk through the fungus patch, you are shot at by many millions of spores. You can hardly breathe.

Exit.Description: The fragrant smell of fungus spores continues to the east

Room.Name: Fungus path
Room.Description: As you walk along the path, millions of spores are shot at you. You can hardly breathe.

Exit.Description: A giant mushroom temple stands to the south.
The fragrant smell of spores continues to the west.

Room.Name: Fungus temple
Room.Description: You find yourself standing inside of a giant mushroom. The inside is decorated in the fashion of a temple.

Room.Name: Sloping passage
Room.Description: You follow a path sloping down from the fungus temple.

Room.Name: Sloping passage
Room.Description: You are on a path that gently slopes up from the underground pool.

Exit.Description: You hear sounds of trickling water.

Room.Name: The Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. You feel lost.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: The Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. You feel lost.

Exit.Description: You see a nomad camp by an oasis.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: The Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. You feel lost.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: The Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. You feel lost.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
You see a river flowing into the mountain.

Room.Name: The Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. You feel lost.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: The Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. You feel lost.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
The sand is glowing in this direction.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: The Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. You feel lost.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: The Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. You feel lost.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: The Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. You feel lost.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
You see a tiny ledge.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: A nomad camp
Room.Description: This small group of desert nomads has stopped for the day to rest and refresh themselves beside this beautiful oasis. Three tents and some camels make up the party. From within two of the tents you hear muffled voices, obviously surprised at your visit.

Exit.Description: You see ill-tempered camels.
You see inside one of the tents a huddled mass of people, probably slaves.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: Inside a small tent
Room.Description: This is a small and simple tent with few possessions in sight. Lying here and there are young-looking men and women, possibly slaves to the leader of this band.

Exit.Description: Waving in the heat over the sand you see a HUGE pyramid.
You see the center of the nomad camp.

Room.Name: Beside the camels
Room.Description: Here stand about ten camels, all hitched to some stakes plugged into the ground. To the east you see a small tent while to the north you see a larger, fancier tent.

Exit.Description: This tent seems to be the temporary abode of the nomad leader. You make a mental note to visit it before you leave.
In this tent there are very large men, all carrying weapons.
You see the center of the nomad camp.

Room.Name: The warrior's tent.
Room.Description: This tent has a few furnishings, but mainly it holds the band's protectors. They all stare at you coldly as you enter.

Exit.Description: Outside you see some peaceful camels.

Room.Name: The main tent
Room.Description: This tent is as lavishly decorated on the inside as it is on the outside. A fancy carpet lies on the sand and numerous baskets line the walls.

Exit.Description: You see some peaceful camels.

Room.Name: The main tent
Room.Description: This is where the leader of this band of nomads resides. He is definitely rich as you inspect the tapestries, baskets, and a few paintings as well.

Exit.Description: You see the entrance to this tent.

Room.Name: Strange Glowing Sand
Room.Description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you. But this patch of desert looks different...the sand glows. You see a futuristic city to the south.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: The wind-swept ledge
Room.Description: Being very careful not to lose your balance, you look around and find that this canyon is about a half a kilometer deep. To the west is a dark cave leading under the desert sands.

Exit.Description: Sand as far as the eye can see.
You see a dark cave.

Room.Name: The cave mouth
Room.Description: The air in here is MUCH cooler than outside. From the west you hear strange sounds, but can see nothing. The cave slopes down into the darkness.

Exit.Description: Outside is lighter and very windy.

Room.Name: The mysterious lair.
Room.Description: You have stumbled upon the home of something. From the treasure haphazardly strewn about and the rotting carcasses, you would guess that this is a dragon's lair. As to what type, you can't really say. The cave narrows out into a tunnel to the west.

Room.Name: A wide tunnel
Room.Description: This tunnel seems to go on forever into the darkness. You carefully feel your way along the walls.

Room.Name: A narrower tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel becomes very narrow and you fight to squeeze your way through. The floor seems to level off a little.

Room.Name: A narrow crack
Room.Description: This part of the tunnel is the hardest to move through as the walls move in to meet you.

Room.Name: A small cavern.
Room.Description: It is dark and damp and bats hang from the ceiling. A narrow crack is in the east wall. The floor now slopes upwards.

Room.Name: A small shaft
Room.Description: From within this shaft you can see a narrow hole in the roof just large enough for one person. Back south is the cavern.

NPC.name: oldstyle dervish raggity
NPC.description: Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use some rest.
NPC.longDescription: The raggity dervish walks on aimlessly.

NPC.name: oldstyle dervish large
NPC.description: Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use LOTS of rest.
NPC.longDescription: The large dervish watches for signs of trouble.

NPC.name: oldstyle snake coral
NPC.description: This relatively harmless snake has bright alternating bands of red, yellow and black.
NPC.longDescription: A brightly colored snake slithers along the sands.

NPC.name: oldstyle scorpion small
NPC.description: The little tail is mighty dangerous for such a small creature.
NPC.longDescription: A small, red scorpion scuttles away at your approach.

NPC.name: oldstyle worm giant purple
NPC.description: He's big, mean, and purple. Watch out!
NPC.longDescription: A giant, purple sand worm thrusts up out of the sand and attacks!

NPC.name: dragon brass
NPC.longDescription: The brass dragon steps out of the darkness and says 'Hello'. Then adds to it, 'Prepare to die, have a nice day!'

NPC.name: oldstyle nomad leader
NPC.description: He is clad in silk robes lined with gold thread. At his side is a large, engraved cutlass. He has an especially haughty air about him.
NPC.longDescription: The nomad leader sits silently in prayer.

NPC.name: oldstyle nomad commander
NPC.description: This is the nomad leader's second in command. His clothes are richly woven of silk and gold thread. A nasty cutlass hangs at his side.
NPC.longDescription: The nomad commander stands here staring suspiciously at you.

NPC.name: oldstyle nomad warrior
NPC.longDescription: A proud nomad warrior stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle slave young
NPC.longDescription: A young slave sits here staring at you with pleading eyes.

NPC.name: dracolich lich
NPC.description: The dracolich is now only bone with pieces of flesh hanging from it. Obviously it no longer fears death.
NPC.longDescription: A pile of bones rises up to form a skeletal dracolich.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Sanctuary DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: oldstyle drider drow
NPC.description: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.
NPC.longDescription: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.

NPC.name: oldstyle duergar dwarf
NPC.description: The duergar could crush your head as easily as it does those rocks.
NPC.longDescription: A duergar is here mining precious stones with his pick.

NPC.name: oldstyle myconoid
NPC.description: The myconoid looks something like a giant mushroom (and probably has the same effect).

NPC.name: oldstyle myconoid shaman
NPC.description: The shaman shoots spores into the air.
NPC.longDescription: A rather large myconoid stands here chanting in a strange tongue.

NPC.name: oldstyle dustdigger
NPC.longDescription: A small oasis invites you to dive in.

NPC.name: oldstyle camel
NPC.longDescription: A very dangerous rabid camel snorts at you.

Item.Name: pick
Item.LongDescription: A small mining pick made of what appears to be silver lies on the ground.

Item.Name: banded mail
Item.ShortDescription: a glowing suit of banded mail
Item.LongDescription: A glowing suit of banded mail lies on the ground.

Item.Name: halberd
Item.LongDescription: A mighty halberd lies against the wall.

Item.Name: amulet
Item.LongDescription: A mushroom shaped amulet lies on the ground.

Item.Name: bone
Item.LongDescription: A large leg bone rests on the ground.

Item.Name: cactus
Item.LongDescription: A small cactus cup lies on the ground.

Item.Name: basket
Item.LongDescription: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

Item.Name: basket
Item.LongDescription: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

Item.Name: basket
Item.LongDescription: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

Item.Name: basket
Item.LongDescription: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

Item.Name: rope
Item.LongDescription: A long coil of rope lies on the ground.

Item.Name: stakes
Item.LongDescription: A small bundle of stakes lies here.

Item.Name: map
Item.LongDescription: An old, tattered, and much faded map lies here.

Item.Name: turban
Item.LongDescription: A thick padded turban lies here.

Item.Name: coins
Item.LongDescription: A great, gleaming pile of treasure lies at your feet.

Item.Name: sabre
Item.LongDescription: A long, curved sabre stands upright in the ground.

Item.Name: scimitar
Item.LongDescription: A curved scimitar lies at your feet.

Item.Name: cutlass
Item.LongDescription: A long, pointed cutlass lies here.

Item.Name: potion pink
Item.LongDescription: A pink potion stands here.

Item.Name: wand platinum
Item.LongDescription: A platinum wand lies here.

Item.Name: bow energy strange
Item.LongDescription: A strange energy bow lies here.

Item.Name: scroll encrypted
Item.LongDescription: An encrypted scroll lies at your feet.

Item.Name: chest
Item.LongDescription: An iron bound chest with a shiny lock sits here.

Item.Name: key golden
Item.LongDescription: A shiny golden key lies here.

Item.Name: bracelet copper
Item.LongDescription: A tarnished copper bracelet lies at your feet.

Item.Name: gem ruby
Item.LongDescription: A large ruby lies on the ground collecting dust.

Item.Name: gem diamond glittering
Item.LongDescription: A glittering diamond lies at your feet.

Item.Name: gem sapphire
Item.LongDescription: A brilliant sapphire lies here twinkling.

Item.Name: gem lapis
Item.LongDescription: A deep blue lapis lazuli gem lies here.

Item.Name: jewel tiger
Item.LongDescription: The Tiger Jewel lies here blazing.

Item.Name: jewel red-eyed
Item.LongDescription: The red-eyed jewel glares at you greedily.

Item.Name: gem emerald
Item.LongDescription: A fiery green emerald sits here.
